summary: An ordinance amending Sections 1, 2 and 4, of Ordinance No. 28215, entitled:" An ordinance providing for the issuance of refunding bonds of the City of Seattle, for the purpose of refunding and paying of bonds of said city, which will mature April 1, 1912, known as Seattle Judgement Bonds of 1892, in the amount of $275,000; Seattle Condemnation Award Bonds of 1892 in the sum of $220,000; and Seattle General Bonds of 1892 in the sum of $240,000; and providing for the issuance and sale thereof, and the levy and collection of taxes for the payment of the principal and interest thereof."
